Title: The Bender
Writer: Marta Kauffman (created by), Howard J. Morris (created by), Brooke Wied, Alex Burnett, Julieanne Smolinski (executive story editor), David Budin (staff writer), Brendan McCarthy (staff writer)
Actors: Jane Fonda, Lily Tomlin, Sam Waterston, Martin Sheen
Plot: Frankie is reunited with an old dear friend, Babe. Her sons meet Jacob over dinner when a drunk Grace interrupt it.
